title: Facebook struggles to sell advertising in India
text:
Internet internetNews Expert 
SAN FRANCISCO/MUMBAI, August 12 (Reuters) â€“ Facebook is trying to lure skeptical advertisers in India with features such as free email support for questions about advertising and advice on increasing sales in a bid to boost revenue from its second biggest market.
